snippet: Goldman is relying more on technology and reducing expenses as it contends with new regulations and an uncertain market, Goldman's chief executive, Lloyd C. Blankfein, says.
abstract: Goldman is relying more on technology and reducing expenses as it contends with new regulations and an uncertain market, Goldman's chief executive, Lloyd C. Blankfein, says.

headline.main: Under New Rules, Goldman Ponders a Leaner Future

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
